SELECT A.big_addr, A.middle_addr, A.small_addr, A.road_addr, A.dong_addr FROM addressrange A
ORDER BY A.big_addr

SELECT A.index, A.codegroup, A.code, A.codename, A.uppercode, A.ord FROM addressrange A
ORDER BY A.ord
SELECT big_addr FROM addressrange GROUP BY big_addr ORDER BY big_addr

SELECT big_addr, middle_addr, small_addr, road_addr, dong_addr, post_number, road_code, dong_code FROM addressrange WHERE big_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{big_addr},'%') GROUP BY middle_addr ORDER BY middle_addr

SELECT A.big_addr, A.middle_addr, A.small_addr, A.road_addr, A.dong_addr, A.post_number, A.road_code, A.dong_code FROM addressrange A WHERE A.big_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{big_addr},'%') AND A.middle_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{middle_addr},'%') AND A.small_addr is not NULL GROUP BY A.small_addr,A.dong_addr

SELECT A.big_addr, A.middle_addr, A.small_addr, A.road_addr, A.dong_addr, A.post_number, A.road_code, A.dong_code FROM addressrange A WHERE A.big_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{big_addr},'%') AND middle_addr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{middle_addr},'%') GROUP BY A.road_addr ORDER BY A.road_addr
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM addressrange A

SELECT memberid, password, grade, gubun, openflag, name, telephone, handphone, address, address_etc, introduce, latitude, longitude, usestartdate, useenddate, deleteyn, lastconnecttime, regtime FROM member WHERE deleteyn = 0 AND gubun in ("1","2")/*all*/ AND gubun = "1"/*약국('1')*/ AND gubun = "2"/*병원('2')*/
AND latitude BETWEEN (#{latitude}-0.0090090090) AND (#{latitude}+0.0090090090)
AND longitude BETWEEN (#{longitude}-0.0112612612) AND (#{longitude}+0.0112612612)

SELECT A.memberid, A.password, A.grade, A.gubun, A.openflag, A.name, A.telephone, A.handphone, A.address, A.address_etc, A.introduce, A.latitude, A.longitude, A.deleteyn, A.lastconnecttime, DATE_FORMAT( A.usestartdate,'%Y.%m.%d') "usestartdate", DATE_FORMAT( A.useenddate,'%Y.%m.%d') "useenddate", DATE_FORMAT( A.regtime,'%Y.%m.%d') "regtime" FROM member A WHERE 1=1 AND A.memberid = #{memberid}
SELECT adindex, adtitle, adowner, telephone, usestartdate, useenddate, playorder, filename, regtime FROM adinfo WHERE usestartdate <= NOW() AND useenddate >= NOW() ORDER BY playorder ASC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT filename FROM adinfo WHERE usestartdate <= NOW() AND useenddate >= NOW() ORDER BY playorder ASC
SELECT CONCAT("/upload/adinfo/",filename) filename FROM adinfo WHERE usestartdate <= NOW() AND useenddate >= NOW() ORDER BY playorder ASC
